title: 3 and Out - Wentz Replacement Crisis, Wk 1 Rookie QB Starters, NFL HC Power, Hurry Up Camp Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Wentz Replacement Crisis, Wk 1 Rookie QB Starters, NFL HC Power, Hurry Up Camp Headlines, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John dives deep into if there's a viable replacement for Carson Wentz that will allow the Colts to avoid an early season collapse, the case for starting rookie QB's in week 1, why NFL coaches have significantly more power than coaches in the other major sports. He also runs through the top headlines out of training camp, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
